sorcer.org.rioproject.net

Class HostUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.org.rioproject.net.HostUtil

  • public final class HostUtil
extends Object
    Utility for getting host name and address.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInetAddress

        public static InetAddress getInetAddress()
                                  throws UnknownHostException
        Return the local host address
        Returns:
        The first non-loopback address. If there are no non-loopback addresses, return the default host address obtained from InetAddress.getLocalHost().
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the local host could be found.

      • getHostAddress

        public static String getHostAddress(String name)
                             throws UnknownHostException
        Return the local host address for a passed in host using InetAddress.getByName(String)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the host to return
        Returns:
        The local host address
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the host name could be found.

      • getHostAddressFromProperty

        public static String getHostAddressFromProperty(String property)
                                         throws UnknownHostException
        Return the local host address based on the value of a system property. using InetAddress.getByName(String). If the system property is not resolvable, return the first non-loopback address. If there are no non-loopback addresses, return the default host address obtained from InetAddress.getLocalHost().
        Parameters:
        property - The property name to use
        Returns:
        The local host address
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the host name could be found.

      • getInetAddressFromProperty

        public static InetAddress getInetAddressFromProperty(String property)
                                              throws UnknownHostException
        Return the InetAddress based on the value of a system property. using InetAddress.getByName(String). If the system property is not resolvable, return the first non-loopback address. If there are no non-loopback addresses, return the default host address obtained from InetAddress.getLocalHost().
        Parameters:
        property - The property name to use
        Returns:
        The local host address
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the host name could be found.

      • getFirstNonLoopbackAddress

        public static InetAddress getFirstNonLoopbackAddress(boolean preferIpv4,
                                     boolean preferIPv6)
                                              throws SocketException
        Get the first non-loopback address.
        Parameters:
        preferIpv4 - If you want the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) address, this value must be true.
        preferIPv6 - If you want the Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) address, this value must be true. If the preferIpv4 is set to true, this value is ignored
        Returns:
        The first non loopback address or null if there are no non-loopback addresses.
        Throws:
        SocketException - If an I/O error occurs.
